name: Paws & Claws: Pet Vet
overview: You Love Animals and They Love You! Now you can pamper and rescue all of your favorite creatures at your own Paws & Claws Pet Vet. Nurture and love the animals to grow your business and become every animal's best friend! Features • Nurse all of your injured patients back to health through 20+ cases• Choose from 10+ different kinds of animals, from cockatoos and guinea pigs to dogs and horses• Visit the 3D clothing shop and choose from 9 cute outfits• Become the best vet and you'll grow your business into the biggest pet clinic in town!
